name: Elegant Bow Garter in pale blue vintage ribbon
description:
Simple but bold, perfect if you're not one for lace! 
Plus it can be your 'something blue'!!

Handmade from vintage ribbon in a gorgeous pale blue and finished with an elegant, simple, oversized bow in the same ribbon.

Unstretched: approx. 30cm, fully stretched: approx 54cm 
Width: approx. 5cm

If you happen to have particularly voluptuous or especially slender thighs, I'm happy to make something in your measurements, just get in touch to discuss (via the 'contact' button).

Free delivery within the UK! (Just £5 everywhere else!)

Comes beautifully gift boxed!

name: Delicate Lace Garter in pale blue
description:
A delicate, subtle garter, perfect for adding just a touch of lace!

Handmade from vintage ribbon and vintage lace, both in pale blue, and finished with a tiny vintage faux pearl.

Unstretched: approx. 30cm, fully stretched: approx 54cm 
Width: approx. 1.7cm

If you happen to have particularly voluptuous or especially slender thighs, I'm happy to make something in your measurements, just get in touch to discuss (via the 'contact' button).

Free delivery within the UK! (Just £5 everywhere else!)

Comes beautifully gift boxed!

name: Stunning Vintage Lace Ring Pillow - palest grey
description:
This delicate little ring pillow is handmade in my London studio using a stunning mix of bamboo 'silk' and exquisite palest grey vintage lace!

The little cushion is approx. 11.5cm square and made using off-white bamboo 'silk' (a gorgeous fabric with the feel of silk, but made from eco-friendly bamboo!)

The top side is layered with beautiful authentic vintage lace (from a vintage handkerchief!) in the palest shade of soft grey. There is navy blue ribbon just off-centre to tie your rings safely in place (see image 3)

FREE UK DELIVERY!

------------

Not exactly what you're after? Do contact me if you would like to discuss ordering a bespoke ring cushion - you can choose a different style, colour, size... whatever suits your wedding!

name: Special Delivery UK
description:
If you need your item/s urgently add this listing to your basket to have your item/s posted by next day Special Delivery within the UK.

Please note your item/s will still take up to four working days to produce, so you will receive your item/s in up to five working days.
